entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 01:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
